title: opensource VeraCrypt tool
extract: VeraCrypt is a free open source disk encryption software for Windows, Mac OSX and Linux. ... Encryption can be hardware-accelerated on modern processors. Provides plausible deniability, in case an adversary forces you to reveal the password: Hidden volume (steganography) and hidden operating system.
